messages.content: According to the provided context, the importance of HR Policy is that it is a statement of strategies on HR functions and for developing the standards of practices, behavior, and boundaries to meet specific goals. It caters to the running of an organization on a successful business and paves the way to achieve its goal. The HR Policy provides direction in the growth of the organization and management of employees, enabling clarity and norming of practices on various issues related to HR management. It also works as a guide to standardization on various aspects of quality services, skill development, and performance appraisal through system and processes. Additionally, it provides scope and opportunities to make concerted and conscious efforts to sensitize HR professionals to the value of making the HR processes measurable, and take them on the path to quality standards in Human Resource Development.
Submission of Documents before issue of Appointment letter

According to the provided context, the submission of documents is a necessary step before the issue of an appointment letter. As stated in section h, "Appointment letter will only be given to successful candidates after receipt of all documents & verification as stated above." This implies that all required documents must be submitted and verified before an appointment letter can be issued. The verification process includes checks on academic credentials, prior employment, references, and background checks, as outlined in section g.

According to the provided context, the Uniform / Dress Code Policy is as follows: 

IIA by its notification may decide the uniform for all level of its employee. For summer and winter seasons, separate code of dress should be provided. 

For Executive staff, the pattern, color, and code of uniform will be different from the Non-Executive staff. 

The Executive Head or any other functionary who has to attend some meeting, gathering on professional or social course, may wear dress in accordance with demand of the place, occasion, and gathering. 

In normal set of conditions: Shirt Trouser with other accessories of prescribed color and design. 

For female employees where serious health issues crop up, they may be allowed to wear Saree and Blouse or Salwar Kurta for convenience of prescribed color and design. 

IIA will provide dress to all its employees as under: 
- 2 Sets of Trouser +Shirt once a year. 
- Formal Shoes once a year. 
- One Blazer once in two years for Executives and One Jacket for Non-Executives. 

Management has the right to discontinue/hold the uniform policy only if a financial limitation arises.
